function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement effective supply chain management strategies, diversify suppliers, maintain emergency stockpiles, and establish rapid response protocols for surges in demand.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct virtual interviews, implement social distancing parameters, screen for symptoms of covid-19, and restrict movements of symptomatic individuals","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate location-sensitive effects of built environment attributes in regression models to provide a more accurate assessment of their impact on disease spread. validate models with location-specific data.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide training and guidelines for proper use of microwave units, and consider upgrading to advanced microwave technologies","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular health assessments and monitoring of building occupants","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nature-based activities","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough validation and testing of the expert system rules and symptom indicators","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote accurate information and fact-checking on social media","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving working environment, providing opportunities for growth and development, seeking feedback from employees to address dissatisfaction.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Retiring brands featuring bame individuals, implementing social distancing measures, promoting vaccination and hygiene practices","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Revamping education, new training programs, and income redistribution","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Store news and information on blockchain to prevent alteration, traceability, and prevention of false information spread","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation, using air purification technologies, and implementing infection control measures","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Density of cities","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Explore cost-effective alternatives, seek funding for equipment, prioritize sensor deployment based on critical monitoring areas.","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health measures, including testing, contact tracing, and temporary lockdowns, to control the spread of the virus.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further studies to clarify the role of absolute and relative humidity in influenza virus survival and transmission","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reevaluation of physical distancing norms, implementation of additional measures for aerosol and surface protection","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regularly update research findings and policy responses to incorporate the latest knowledge and developments.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement economic stimulus measures, financial support programs, and flexible funding arrangements","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote online and mobile banking options, provide sanitation and safety measures in branches, and limit the number of in-person transactions.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement data structuring and management systems, conduct data cleaning and normalization, and provide training on data organization","category":"Data management","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Search for evidence beyond ’conventional’ sources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement self-health evaluation protocols, provide partitions/barriers, enforce mask-wearing, and disinfection after each use of the vehicle.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Investing in building capacity and strengthening institutions","category":"Maintaining/building water systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promote the value of retail work, offer career development opportunities, and enhance job benefits and rewards.","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict suppression strategies to reverse epidemic growth, reduce case numbers to low levels, and maintain that situation indefinitely. this may involve strict lockdowns, travel restrictions, and other measures to reduce transmission rates.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve environmental quality through better site design and regional planning, reduce pollution","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of healthy design principles and spatial reorganization","category":"Improving physical environment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of respiratory masks, cough etiquette, and avoidance of close contact","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement specific methodologies for case identification, suppression, and resource provision","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement balanced ventilation and air distribution systems","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergency preparedness planning","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of balcony in apartments","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct resource optimization analysis to identify the optimal mix of medical and non-medical personnel","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote investment in carbon-neutral and nature-positive activities, develop green recovery plans, and set sustainability targets.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identify and implement additional air disinfection and ventilation strategies to achieve higher pathogen reductions, and conduct regular monitoring of pathogen levels to assess effectiveness.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thorough verification and validation of crowd models, continuous updates based on new knowledge of disease transmission mechanisms and crowd behavior","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase collaboration and digital literacy, enhance data management skills","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing context-specific integrated approaches, understanding local factors, and adaptive planning","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop alternative data collection methods for long-term analysis","category":"Data management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of sequencing results through multiple platforms, use of quality control measures in sequencing and bioinformatics analysis","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforce regular maintenance of air-conditioning and ventilation systems, implement air quality monitoring, and promote proper ventilation practices.","category":"Maintaining/building water systems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Testing and diagnosis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Targeted outreach and communication","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage vaccination, promote good hygiene practices, and use personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Investment in research, surveillance, and infrastructure for early detection and response","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection of shared office tools, and promoting good hand hygiene practices among employees.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhance communication of hygienic precautions and safety measures through untact marketing strategies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing essential information to first responders and public","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"}]}
